name: LAVA FROG
description:
You are a TINY NINJA FROG, training to be your very best. Leap up a tower filled with hazardous lava and dangerous creatures. If you jump fast enough, you might just unlock some CRITTER FRIENDS.

Design & Programming: Lars Brady (https://lorsgames.itch.io/)

Tunes: Sulkin' Raven (https://www.sulkinraven.com/)

Pixel Art: Pixel Frog (https://pixelfrog-store.itch.io/)

Death Sound: Nich Mebane (https://twitter.com/Sweet_Niche)

Background Art: Blackspire (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/2d/environments/medieval-pixel-art-asset-f...)
